name: Dream House
summary_text: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.

name: Emperor
summary_text: Action epic about young Johanna "Of Ghent" (Sophie Cookson), who seeks revenge on the holy Roman Emperor Charles V (Adrian Brody) for the death of her father. It happens in a world of ...                See full summary »

name: Beckett
summary_text: Following a tragic car accident in Greece, Beckett, an American tourist, finds himself at the center of a dangerous political conspiracy and on the run for his life.

name: Assault on VA-33
summary_text: Decorated veteran and PTSD sufferer, Jason Hill (Flanery) meets his wife, Jennifer, for lunch at the Veteran's Affairs hospital where she works. After Jennifer is called away for an ...                See full summary »

name: Perfect Stranger
summary_text: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

name: Wimbledon
summary_text: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

name: What Men Want
summary_text: A woman is boxed out by the male sports agents in her profession, but gains an unexpected edge over them when she develops the ability to hear men's thoughts.

name: Grace Under Fire
summary_text: Grace is a recovering alcoholic, now divorced from an abusive husband, struggling to bring up three children on her own.

name: Lexx
summary_text: A group of disparate fugitives from an interplanetary tyranny find themselves in control of a massively powerful starship.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
summary_text: To win a bet, an eccentric British inventor, beside his Chinese valet and an aspiring French artist, embarks on a trip full of adventures and dangers around the world in exactly eighty days.

name: How High
summary_text: Two guys by the name of Silas and Jamal decided to one day smoke something magical, which eventually helps them to ace their college entrance exam.

name: Victor Frankenstein
summary_text: Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein became the man - and the legend - we know today.

name: The Miniaturist
summary_text: A young woman moves to 17th century Amsterdam and hires a mysterious local miniaturist to furnish the dollhouse she received from her merchant husband as a present, but the lifelike miniatures somehow start eerily foreshadowing her fate.

name: Odd Squad
summary_text: Geared for children ages 5-8, "Odd Squad" follows two young agents, Olive and Otto, who are part of an agency that seeks to save the day using math when odd things happen.

name: The Saint
summary_text: International master thief, Simon Templar, also known as The Saint, is tasked to find a man's kidnapped daughter. In addition to evading the authorities, Simon must face a dangerous adversary from his past.

name: Doctor Dolittle
summary_text: After the animal communicating veterinarian goes too far for his clientele, he and his friends escape their hometown to the sea in search of the Great Pink Sea Snail.

name: Hellsing Ultimate
summary_text: The vampire Alucard, his master Sir Integra Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing, and his newly sired ward Seras Victoria, try to protect England from a war-crazed SS-Major who seeks to start an eternal war with his vampire army.

name: Z
summary_text: A family find themselves terrorized by their eight-year-old son's imaginary friend.

name: Casanova
summary_text: The fabled romantic Giacomo Casanova, after failing to win the affection of the Venetian woman Francesca Bruni, strives to discover the real meaning of love.

name: Casual
summary_text: A comedy series about a bachelor brother and his newly divorced sister living under one roof again. Together, they coach each other through the crazy world of dating while raising her teenage daughter.

name: Equinox
summary_text: Four friends are attacked by a demon while on a picnic, due to possession of a tome of mystic information. Told in flashbacks by the sole survivor.

name: A Scanner Darkly
summary_text: An undercover cop in a not-too-distant future becomes involved with a dangerous new drug and begins to lose his own identity as a result.

name: Runaway Train
summary_text: Two escaped convicts and a female railway worker find themselves trapped on a train with no brakes and nobody driving.

name: The Stylist
summary_text: A lonely hair stylist becomes obsessed with the lives of her clients and descends into murderous madness.

name: Hell House LLC
summary_text: Five years after an unexplained malfunction causes the death of 15 tour-goers and staff on the opening night of a Halloween haunted house tour, a documentary crew travels back to the scene of the tragedy to find out what really happened.

name: Monster Musume: Everyday Life with Monster Girls
summary_text: In a world where humans co-exist with fantasy beings, a young man must share a flat with a bevy of beastly beauties.

name: What's Your Number?
summary_text: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

name: Semi-Pro
summary_text: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true.

name: Exorcist II: The Heretic
summary_text: A teenage girl once possessed by a demon finds that it still lurks within her. Meanwhile, a priest investigates the death of the girl's exorcist.

name: The Kentucky Fried Movie
summary_text: A series of short, highly irreverent, and often tasteless skits.

name: Hanging Up
summary_text: A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
summary_text: A family tragedy prompts gangster Carl "CJ" Johnson to return home, only to find it overrun by crime and corruption, which he must regain control of the streets before it gets even worse.

name: Ransom
summary_text: Multi-millionaire Tom Mullen's son is kidnapped, but after initially agreeing to pay the ransom Mullen then decides to use the ransom money as a bounty.

name: Taxi
summary_text: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

name: Trance
summary_text: An art auctioneer becomes mixed up with a group of criminals partners with a hypnotherapist in order to recover a lost painting.

name: Beartown
summary_text: Hockey is the last beacon of hope in Beartown and being responsible for it is a heavy burden. The day of the semi-final match is also the catalyst for a violent act that will leave a young girl traumatized and a town in turmoil.

name: Ordinary Love
summary_text: An extraordinary look at the lives of a middle-aged couple in the midst of the wife's breast cancer diagnosis.

name: Summer Villa
summary_text: A celebrity chef who is getting over a bad review and a romance novelist who can't seem to get her next book started meet accidentally at a French villa.

name: Gunda
summary_text: Documentary looks at the daily life of a pig and its farm animal companions: two cows and a one-legged chicken.

name: Laverne & Shirley
summary_text: The misadventures of two single women in the 1950s and '60s.

name: Elizabethtown
summary_text: During a hometown memorial for his Kentucky-born father, a young man begins an unexpected romance with a too-good-to-be-true stewardess.

name: Blackadder
summary_text: In the Middle Ages, Prince Edmund the Black Adder constantly schemes and endeavors to seize the crown from his father and brother.

name: Another Earth
summary_text: On the night of the discovery of a duplicate Earth in the Solar system, an ambitious young student and an accomplished composer cross paths in a tragic accident.

name: They Shall Not Grow Old
summary_text: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.

name: Arsenic and Old Lace
summary_text: A writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to get married. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

name: Wild Wild Country
summary_text: When Osho, the world's most controversial guru, builds an Utopian city deep in the Oregon country, conflict with the locals escalates into a national scandal.

name: The Larry Sanders Show
summary_text: A comedic behind the scenes look at a late night talk show.

name: Books of Blood
summary_text: A journey into uncharted and forbidden territory through three tales tangled in space and time.

name: First Wives Club
summary_text: TV adaptation of the 1996 comedy about about three divorced wives who share a common past.

name: City Island
summary_text: Prison guard Vince tells Molly from acting class, that one inmate is his 24 y.o. love child. Vince takes him home to stay with his family - straight A son with fat girl fetish, college dropout/stripper daughter and cute wife.

name: Shaft
summary_text: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

name: Prime Day Show
summary_text: Three-Part Musical Event featuring Billie Eilish, H.E.R., and Kid Cudi.

name: Enough Said
summary_text: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.

name: Spider-Man
summary_text: When a new villain threatens New York City, Peter Parker and Spider-Man's worlds collide. To save the city and those he loves, he must rise up and be greater.

name: Broken Arrow
summary_text: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but don't count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

name: Running with the Devil
summary_text: The CEO of an international conglomerate sends two of his most regarded executives to investigate why shipments of cocaine are being hijacked and over cut somewhere on the supply chain.

name: Empty Nest
summary_text: "Empty Nest" tells of the day to day misadventures of a widowed pediatrician named Harry Weston and his two adult daughters, Barbara and Carol, who have come back to live with him after failed marriages.

name: Jett
summary_text: World-class thief Daisy "Jett" Kowalski is just out of prison and already being forced back into what got her there, by a group of eccentric and dangerous criminals.

name: Wayne's World 2
summary_text: The inseparable duo try to organize a rock concert while Wayne must fend off a record producer who has an eye for his girlfriend.

name: Mortal Kombat: Conquest
summary_text: Kung Lao has triumphed in the Mortal Kombat tournament, defeating Shang Tsung and saving Earth Realm. Now, he must train a new generation of warriors for the next tournament.

name: Donkey Punch
summary_text: Things go drastically wrong for a group of British holidaymakers in Spain.

name: The Empress Ki
summary_text: A Korea-born warrior girl had to be a servant at the Mongol Yuan court but somehow overcame her low status to become an empress in another land.

name: The Longest Yard
summary_text: A sadistic warden asks a former pro quarterback, now serving time in his prison, to put together a team of inmates to take on (and get pummeled by) the guards.

name: Spread
summary_text: A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.

name: Crossing Lines
summary_text: A special crime unit investigates serialized crimes that cross over European borders, to hunt down criminals and bring them to justice.

name: The Daughter
summary_text: The story follows a man who returns home to discover a long-buried family secret, and whose attempts to put things right threaten the lives of those he left home years before.

name: Baskets
summary_text: After failing at a prestigious French clowning college, Chip Baskets looks to keep his dream of becoming a professional clown alive.

name: XXY
summary_text: The story of an intersex fifteen-year-old. She lives with her parents, who have to cope with the challenges of her medical condition.

name: Two Night Stand
summary_text: A snowstorm forces two people who made an online connection to unwillingly extend their one-night stand as the blizzard goes through the night.

name: Valley of the Dolls
summary_text: Film version of Jacqueline Susann's best-selling novel chronicling the rise and fall of three young women in show business.

name: Playing with Fire
summary_text: Three prosperous women, including a mother and her daughter, fall for a seductive man in Colombia's Coffee Triangle.

name: Once Upon a Time in Wonderland
summary_text: In Victorian England, the young and beautiful Alice tells a tale of a strange new land that exists on the other side of a rabbit hole.

name: Psycho
summary_text: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

name: Courage the Cowardly Dog
summary_text: The offbeat adventures of Courage, a cowardly dog who must overcome his own fears to heroically defend his unknowing farmer owners from all kinds of dangers, paranormal events and menaces that appear around their land.

name: Roxanne
summary_text: The large-nosed C.D. Bales is in love with the beautiful Roxanne; she falls for his personality but another man's looks.

name: The Trial of Christine Keeler
summary_text: Story of Christine Keeler, who found herself at the heart of a political sex scandal that rocked British government in the 1960s.

name: T-34
summary_text: In 1944, a courageous group of Russian soldiers managed to escape from German captivity in a half-destroyed legendary T-34 tank. Those were the times of unforgettable bravery, fierce fighting, unbreakable love, and legendary miracles.

name: Forged in Fire
summary_text: Four custom knife makers compete to make the best usable knife through a series of challenges.

name: Black Books
summary_text: Bernard Black runs a book shop, though his customer service skills leave something to be desired. He hires Manny as an employee. Fran runs the shop next door. Between the three of them many adventures ensue.

name: Senior Moment
summary_text: After drag racing his vintage convertible around Palm Springs, a retired NASA test pilot loses his license. Forced to take public transportation, he meets Caroline and learns to navigate love and life again.

name: Siyah Beyaz Ask
summary_text: A doctor who has devoted herself to healing others encounters a cold-blooded killer with a wounded past. What happens when the woman who saves lives is captured by the man who takes them?

name: Detroit
summary_text: Fact-based drama set during the 1967 Detroit riots in which a group of rogue police officers respond to a complaint with retribution rather than justice on their minds.

name: Villains
summary_text: After a pair of amateur criminals break into a suburban home, they stumble upon a dark secret that two sadistic homeowners will do anything to keep from getting out.

name: The Hole in the Ground
summary_text: A single mother living in the Irish countryside with her son begins to suspect he may not be her son at all, and fears his increasingly disturbing behavior is linked to a mysterious sinkhole in the forest behind their house.

name: I Stand Alone
summary_text: A horse meat butcher's life and mind begins to breakdown as he lashes out against various factions of society while attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.

name: The New Batman Adventures
summary_text: The further and darker adventures of Batman with a new Robin, a closer association with Batgirl and the previous Robin now as Nightwing.

name: You Again
summary_text: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.

name: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
summary_text: A Portokalos family secret brings the beloved characters back together for an even bigger and Greeker wedding.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
summary_text: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas Marshall hunts them.

name: A Dog's Way Home
summary_text: A female dog travels four hundred miles in search of her owner throughout a Colorado wilderness.

name: The X Files
summary_text: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

name: Cam Tavanlar
summary_text: A story full of competition, revenge, love and determination, telling about women's inequality of opportunity in social life.

name: Child's Play 2
summary_text: While Andy's mother is admitted to a psychiatric hospital, the young boy is placed in foster care, and Chucky, determined to claim Andy's soul, is not far behind.

name: The Tenant
summary_text: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

name: White Noise
summary_text: Set at a bucolic mid-western college known only as The-College-on-the-Hill, White Noise follows a year in the life of Jack Gladney, a professor who has made his name by pioneering the field of Hitler studies.

name: Spring, Summer, Fall, Winter... and Spring
summary_text: A boy is raised by a Buddhist monk in an isolated floating temple where the years pass like the seasons.

name: City of Ember
summary_text: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Ember's once powerful generator is failing and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

name: American Badger
summary_text: A seemingly cold-blooded hitman is assigned to befriend a call girl, but all hell breaks loose when he is forced to kill her.

name: Love & Mercy
summary_text: In the 60s, Beach Boys leader Brian Wilson struggles with emerging psychosis as he attempts to craft his avant-garde pop masterpiece. In the 80s, he is a broken, confused man under the 24-hour watch of shady therapist Dr. Eugene Landy.

name: Rio Lobo
summary_text: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

name: Little Women
summary_text: Dramatization of Louisa May Alcott's novel about the lives of the four March sisters during the American Civil War as they learn to navigate love, loss, and the trials of growing up.

name: The Devil in the White City
summary_text: An architect works to build up the 1893 World's Fair, while the serial killer H. H. Holmes uses the fair to attract and kill women.

name: Disturbing the Peace
summary_text: A small-town marshal who hasn't carried a gun since he left the Texas Rangers after a tragic shooting, must pick up his gun again to battle with a gang of outlaw bikers that has invaded the town to pull off a brazen and violent heist.

name: Season of the Witch
summary_text: Fourteenth century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

name: Drag Race España
summary_text: Spanish Drag superstar Supremme Deluxe presides as ten of Spain's most talented queens compete to be crowned Spain's first Drag Race Superstar.

name: Solaris
summary_text: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

name: Flowers in the Attic
summary_text: After the sudden death of their father, four children face cruel treatment from their ruthless grandmother.

name: Deputy
summary_text: Deputy Bill Hollister, a career lawman who is very comfortable kicking down doors, but is utterly lost in a staff meeting, becomes acting sheriff of Los Angeles County when the sheriff drops dead.

name: Line of Duty
summary_text: A disgraced cop finds himself in a race against time to find a kidnap victim whose abductor he accidentally killed.

name: The Girlfriend Experience
summary_text: A drama set in the days leading up to the 2008 Presidential election, and centered on a high-end Manhattan call girl meeting the challenges of her boyfriend, her clients, and her work.

name: Cinema Toast
summary_text: Experimental new series from eclectic group of celebrated indie filmmakers who've re-edited and re-scored footage from public domain films and overdubbed them with performances of contemporary actors to tell new, wholly original stories.

name: 24: Legacy
summary_text: A military hero who returns to the U.S. with a whole lot of trouble following him back. With nowhere else to turn, the man asks CTU to help him save his life while also stopping one of the largest-scale terror attacks on American soil.

name: Big Night
summary_text: New Jersey, 1950s. Two brothers run an Italian restaurant. Business is not going well as a rival Italian restaurant is out-competing them. In a final effort to save the restaurant, the brothers plan to put on an evening of incredible food.

name: Greenhouse Academy
summary_text: Almost a year after their astronaut mother's tragic death, brother and sister Alex and Hayley Woods start to attend an elite boarding school for future leaders, but they soon realize that that everything is not as it seems.

name: Sonchiriya
summary_text: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

name: I'm Dying Up Here
summary_text: The series is based on William Knoedelseder's book of the same name.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary_text: The adventures of a quartet of humanoid warrior turtles and their friends.

name: Rams
summary_text: A decades-long feud between two sheep farming brothers comes to a head when disaster strikes their flocks.

name: Kona fer í stríð
summary_text: Halla becomes a determined environmental activist, but this threatens a long-held hope of hers.

name: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
summary_text: In the Iranian ghost-town Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

name: Candy
summary_text: A poet falls in love with an art student who gravitates to his bohemian lifestyle -- and his love of heroin. Hooked as much on one another as they are on the drug, their relationship alternates between states of oblivion, self-destruction, and despair.

name: The ABC Murders
summary_text: In 1933, retired detective Hercule Poirot is targeted by a taunting killer who sends letters signed "ABC", which Poirot must decode in order to discover the identity of the murderer.

name: I Give It a Year
summary_text: Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?

name: Inside Look: The Assassination of Gianni Versace - American Crime Story
summary_text: An inside look at the making of American Crime Story: The Assassination of Gianni Versace.

name: The Bernie Mac Show
summary_text: A stand up comedian suddenly becomes a father when he takes custody of his sister's three children.

name: The Kid
summary_text: The story of a young boy who witnesses Billy the Kid's encounter with Sheriff Pat Garrett.

name: Magic City
summary_text: Centers on Miami mobsters and other characters from Miami Beach in the late 1950s.

name: Dope
summary_text: Life changes for Malcolm, a geek who's surviving life in a tough neighborhood, after a chance invitation to an underground party leads him and his friends into a Los Angeles adventure.

name: White Gold
summary_text: The story of a double-glazing showroom in Essex in 1983, led by charismatic salesman Vincent who will happily break the rules if it guarantees a sale.

name: Star Trek Continues
summary_text: The further adventures of the crew of the USS Enterprise.

name: Wine Country
summary_text: During a vacation to Napa Valley, a group of long time friends reunite and revisit past choices in this hilarious and heartfelt comedy from director Amy Poehler.

name: Ali G Indahouse
summary_text: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

name: Conspiracy
summary_text: At the Wannsee Conference on January 20, 1942, senior Nazi officials meet to determine the manner in which the so-called "Final Solution to the Jewish Question" can be best implemented.

name: Life on Top
summary_text: Based on a novel by Clara Darling, about a college grad who heads to a big city looking for work and discovers her older sister, who's been living there for years, is a model.

name: North and South, Book I
summary_text: Two friends, one northern and one southern, struggle to maintain their friendship as events build towards the American Civil War.

name: The Duchess of Duke Street
summary_text: Louisa is an ordinary girl living in Victorian London. She is looking for a job and ends up talking her way into the kitchen of a Lords townhouse. The Lord has a rather snooty French chef, ...                See full summary »

name: Gringo
summary_text: GRINGO, a dark comedy mixed with white-knuckle action and dramatic intrigue, explores the battle of survival for businessman Harold Soyinka (David Oyelowo) when he finds himself crossing the line from law-abiding citizen to wanted criminal.

name: Dinner in America
summary_text: An on-the-lam punk rocker and a young woman obsessed with his band unexpectedly fall in love and go on an epic journey together through America's decaying Midwestern suburbs.

name: The Ones Below
summary_text: A couple expecting their first child discover an unnerving difference between themselves and the couple living in the flat below them who are also having a baby.

name: The Doctor Blake Mysteries
summary_text: Dr Lucien Blake left Ballarat as a young man. But now he finds himself returning, to take over not only his dead father's medical practice, but also his on-call role as the town's police surgeon.

name: Amour
summary_text: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

name: Great News
summary_text: A New Jersey mom puts her relationship with her daughter to the test when she lands an internship at her new job, which comes with many challenges.

name: The Midnight Meat Train
summary_text: A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways.

name: Perfect Sense
summary_text: A chef and a scientist fall in love as an epidemic begins to rob people of their sensory perceptions.

name: Zulu
summary_text: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

name: Highlander II: The Quickening
summary_text: In the future, Highlander Connor MacLeod must prevent the destruction of Earth under an anti-ozone shield.

name: Problem Child
summary_text: A young boy is just short of a monster. He is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

name: The Guns of Navarone
summary_text: A team of allied saboteurs are assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

name: The Lords of Salem
summary_text: Heidi, a radio DJ, is sent a box containing a record - a "gift from the Lords". The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

name: Amityville II: The Possession
summary_text: A dysfunctional family moves into a new house, which proves to be satanic, resulting in the demonic possession of their teenage son.

name: French Kiss
summary_text: A woman flying to France to confront her straying fiance gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.

name: Aqua Teen Hunger Force
summary_text: The misadventures of a milkshake, an order of fries, a meatball, and their retired next door neighbor in the suburbs of New Jersey.

name: Rita
summary_text: Following the life of a very outspoken and rebellious woman, Rita is a school teacher who is competent in the classroom, but seems to need a teacher of her own, when it comes to her personal life.

name: The Guilty
summary_text: A demoted police officer assigned to a call dispatch desk is conflicted when he receives an emergency phone call from a kidnapped woman.

name: Miracle
summary_text: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

name: Daylight
summary_text: Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.

name: Submarine
summary_text: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.

name: Slaughterhouse Rulez
summary_text: An illustrious British boarding school becomes a bloody battleground when a mysterious sinkhole appears at a nearby fracking site unleashing unspeakable horror.

name: Malevolent
summary_text: A team of scam artists get more than they bargained for when a job at a haunted country estate gets out of hand.

name: Black Sea
summary_text: In order to make good with his former employers, a submarine captain takes a job with a shadowy backer to search the depths of the Black Sea for a submarine rumored to be loaded with gold.

name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
summary_text: In this sequel of Marvel's Spider-Man (2018), you can play as Miles Morales as a new and different Spider-Man while he learns some stories about his will of fighting crime and serving justice by his mentor and former hero, Peter Parker.

name: Hercai
summary_text: Miran is seeking revenge for his parents death so he plans to marry daughter Reyyan from the family who were responsible for that. Unexpectedly he falls in love with Reyyan. Will this change the plan?

name: The Lost Pirate Kingdom
summary_text: The real-life pirates of the Caribbean violently plunder, stealing and form a surprisingly egalitarian republic in this documentary series.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
summary_text: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

name: Two Distant Strangers
summary_text: A man trying to get home to his dog gets stuck in a time loop that forces him to relive a deadly run-in with a cop.

name: What We Did on Our Holiday
summary_text: A family of five is off to Granddad's big 75th birthday party at an uncle's estate in rural Scotland. The parents are separated and hope their three kids won't mention it. The kids love, can talk with, and will do anything for, Granddad.

name: The Rescuers Down Under
summary_text: The R.A.S. agents, Miss Bianca and Bernard, race to Australia to save a little boy and a rare golden eagle from a murderous poacher.

name: Romeo Must Die
summary_text: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.

name: Control Z
summary_text: When a hacker begins releasing students' secrets to the entire high school, the socially isolated but observant Sofía works to uncover his/her identity.

name: Death Race 2000
summary_text: In a dystopian future, a cross country automobile race requires contestants to run down innocent pedestrians to gain points that are tallied based on each kill's brutality.

name: Intolerable Cruelty
summary_text: A beautiful gold digger matches wits with a shrewd Beverly Hills divorce lawyer who is increasingly attracted to her.

name: Not Going Out
summary_text: The mishaps of slacker Lee, Lee's best mate Tim, Lee's long-suffering landlady and the love of Lee's life, Lucy, and Tim's well-meaning but dim-witted girlfriend Daisy.

name: The Answer Man
summary_text: A reclusive author of spiritual books is pursued for advice by a single mother and a man fresh out of rehab.

name: Monty Python's Flying Circus
summary_text: The original surreal sketch comedy showcase for the Monty Python troupe.

name: The Witch: Part 1 - The Subversion
summary_text: A high school student with amnesia tries to uncover what has happened to her. All leading her into deeper troubles ultimately revealing a darkness she could not have imagined.

name: Loving Vincent
summary_text: In a story depicted in oil painted animation, a young man comes to the last hometown of painter Vincent van Gogh (Robert Gulaczyk) to deliver the troubled artist's final letter and ends up investigating his final days there.

name: Mektoub, My Love: Canto Uno
summary_text: A teen boy comes back to his hometown during summer vacation in search for love (in 1994).

name: The Rum Diary
summary_text: American journalist Paul Kemp takes on a freelance job in Puerto Rico for a local newspaper during the 1960s and struggles to find a balance between island culture and the expatriates who live there.

name: Rim of the World
summary_text: Four misfit campers must band together and conquer their fears in order to save the world during an alien invasion.

name: Superman II: The Richard Donner Cut
summary_text: Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.

name: Epic
summary_text: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group of characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

name: Henry: Portrait of a Serial Killer
summary_text: Arriving in Chicago, Henry 'Michael Rooker, in what is undoubtedly the finest performance of his patchy career', moves in with ex-con acquaintance Otis and starts schooling him in the ways of the serial killer.

name: Emmanuelle
summary_text: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.

name: When in Rome
summary_text: Beth is a young, ambitious New Yorker who is completely unlucky in love. However, on a whirlwind trip to Rome, she impulsively steals some coins from a reputed fountain of love, and is then aggressively pursued by a band of suitors.

name: This Island Earth
summary_text: Aliens come to Earth seeking scientists to help them in their war.

name: The Grinder
summary_text: Television lawyer Dean Sanderson moves back to his small home town after a stint in Hollywood, thinking that his time on TV qualifies him to run his family's law firm.

name: An Uncommon Grace
summary_text: After a tour of duty, an army nurse returns to her grandmother's farm in Amish country, where she finds unexpected romance and is pulled into a murder mystery.

name: The Arrival
summary_text: Zane, an astronomer, discovers intelligent alien life. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will do anything to stop Zane from learning it.

name: Love & Friendship
summary_text: Lady Susan Vernon takes up temporary residence at her in-laws' estate and, while there, is determined to be a matchmaker for her daughter Frederica -- and herself too, naturally.

name: Being Human
summary_text: Three twenty-somethings share a house and try to live a normal life despite being a ghost, a werewolf, and a vampire.

name: All Saints
summary_text: With Ward 17 closed down, the team from All Saints face big changes as they are split up and some are moved to the fast paced world of the Emergency Department, headed by Director of Emergency Frank Campion.

name: The Crucible
summary_text: A Salem resident attempts to frame her ex-lover's wife for being a witch in the middle of the 1692 witchcraft trials.

name: Draft Day
summary_text: At the NFL Draft, General Manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

name: Into the Ashes
summary_text: Nick escapes his criminal past and 2 partners, gets a steady job, a friend at work and marries the sheriff's daughter. But his past catches up with him, when his ex partners track him down and want their share of the loot.

name: The Producers
summary_text: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

name: The Coldest Case
summary_text: In "The Coldest Case," homicide detective Billy Harney sends his new partner, Kate, deep undercover to infiltrate a notorious Chicago drug ring. When several members of the ring turn up ...                See full summary »

name: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
summary_text: In this parody of blaxploitation movies, a black hero wannabe reunites former black heroes from the 70s to help him get revenge on Mr. Big.

name: The Grapes of Wrath
summary_text: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

name: The Lost World
summary_text: The adventures of a band of explorers stranded in a mysterious land inhabited by dinosaurs and other dangers.

name: Dan in Real Life
summary_text: A widower finds out the woman he fell in love with is his brother's girlfriend.

name: Leap!
summary_text: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.

name: We Hunt Together
summary_text: A gripping twist on a classic cat-and-mouse story, this British drama series explores the intoxication of sexual attraction and the dangerous power of emotional manipulation as two conflicted detectives track down a pair of deadly killers.

name: Blue Murder
summary_text: Set in 1980s Sydney, this acclaimed mini-series tells the story of the relationship between corrupt Detective Roger Rogerson and one of Australia's most infamous criminals Neddy Smith.

name: A Cinderella Story: Starstruck
summary_text: Finley Tremaine, a small town farm girl, longs to spread her wings and soar as an aspiring performer. When a Hollywood film crew arrives in her sleepy town, she is determined to land a role...                See full summary »

name: 6 Days
summary_text: Based on the Iranian Embassy siege of 1980, this action-thriller dramatizes a six-day standoff between armed Iranian Arabs and SAS soldiers ready for a counterattack.

name: The Last Dragon
summary_text: In New York City, a young man searches for a Master to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the Glow.

name: The Jane Austen Book Club
summary_text: Six Californians start a club to discuss the works of Jane Austen, only to find their relationships -- both old and new -- begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.

name: Night of the Sicario
summary_text: Taylor is forced to hide the young daughter of a Colombian woman in witness protection who will be testifying against a powerful drug cartel in Federal Court, as ruthless sicarios aim to hunt them down.

name: Revenge
summary_text: A retired US Navy pilot comes to Mexico, where he falls in love with the wife of a powerful businessman. The consequences will be cruel and unforeseen.

name: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
summary_text: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

name: The Dead Pool
summary_text: Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must stop a sick secret contest to murder local celebrities, which includes himself as a target.

name: Bad Boys
summary_text: Chicago crime kid Mick O'Brien is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

name: Fame
summary_text: The stories of the students and faculty of the New York City High School for the Performing Arts.

name: Zooey
summary_text: When a young boy, Noah, meets Zooey, a young girl living in a motel, they form an unbreakable bond. Soon after Noah discovers a secret about her that changes the course of his summer forever.

name: The Hotel New Hampshire
summary_text: The film talks about a family that weathers all sorts of disasters and keeps going in spite of it all. It is noted for its wonderful assortment of oddball characters.

name: Free Solo
summary_text: Alex Honnold attempts to become the first person to ever free solo climb El Capitan.

name: Salute Your Shorts
summary_text: A group of kids at a summer camp, run by the heard-but-never-seen Dr. Kahn, form friendships as they spend time harassing buffoonish camp counselor Kevin "Ug" Lee.

name: Rad
summary_text: The story of one young man, Cru Jones, who has the intensity and desire to win a BMX race called Helltrack.

name: About Schmidt
summary_text: A recently retired man embarks on a journey to his estranged daughter's wedding, only to discover more about himself and life than he ever expected.

name: Boy
summary_text: Set on the east coast of New Zealand in 1984, Boy, an 11-year-old child and devout Michael Jackson fan, gets a chance to know his absentee criminal father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.

name: Act Naturally
summary_text: When two estranged stepsisters inherit their father's nudist resort, getting back to nature has never been so completely unnatural. A FilmBuff Presentation.

name: The F**k-It List
summary_text: After a prank blows up on a high school senior's life, he shares a list of certain things he wishes he'd done differently.

name: Out of Time
summary_text: A Florida police chief must solve a vicious double homicide before he himself falls under suspicion.

name: Selfie
summary_text: After being the subject of an embarrassing viral video, a self-involved 20-something enlists the help of a marketing expert to revamp her image in the real world.

name: I Kill Giants
summary_text: Barbara Thorson struggles through life by escaping into a fantasy life of magic and monsters.

name: Ruby Sparks
summary_text: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.

name: Little Darlings
summary_text: Two fifteen year-old girls from different sides of the tracks compete to see who will be the first to lose their virginity while at a summer camp.

name: Ultimate Spider-Man
summary_text: Spider-Man battles evil with a new team of teen colleagues and training from S.H.I.E.L.D.

name: The Secrets She Keeps
summary_text: A chance encounter between two pregnant women in a supermarket just outside of Sydney.

name: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
summary_text: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

name: Smokey and the Bandit II
summary_text: The Bandit goes on another cross-country run, transporting an elephant from Florida to Texas. And, once again, Sheriff Buford T. Justice is on his tail.

name: Arbitrage
summary_text: A troubled hedge fund magnate desperate to complete the sale of his trading empire makes an error that forces him to turn to an unlikely person for help.

name: The Only Living Boy in New York
summary_text: Adrift in New York City, a recent college graduate's life is upended by his father's mistress.

name: Harsh Times
summary_text: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

name: An Inspector Calls
summary_text: A mysterious Inspector investigates the wealthy Birling family and their dinner guests following the suicide of a young woman.

name: Hitchcock
summary_text: The relationship between Alfred Hitchcock and his wife Alma Reville during the filming of Psycho (1960) in 1959 is explored.

name: The Hottie & the Nottie
summary_text: A woman agrees to go on a date with a man only if he finds a suitor for her unattractive best friend.

name: Love at the Ranch
summary_text: Allison Sawyer is the go-to reporter at Metropolis Post, known for breaking high-profile stories. Her next story is writing a profile piece on one of her favourite authors Annabelle Lee. ...                See full summary »

name: Notorious
summary_text: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

name: O sabor das margaridas
summary_text: While investigating the disappearance of a teenage girl in a tight-knit Galician town, a Civil Guard officer uncovers secrets linked to a loss of her own.

name: American Woman
summary_text: A woman raises her young grandson after her daughter goes missing.

name: Showdown in Little Tokyo
summary_text: Two L.A. cops with opposing views on what is the best way to uphold the law have to work together to bring down the Yakuza, while trying to protect a beautiful woman.

name: Running Man
summary_text: Running Man is a reality-variety show where the cast must complete missions at various places to win the race.

name: Hap and Leonard
summary_text: Set in the late 1980's Hap and Leonard is a darkly comic swamp noir of two best friends, one femme fatale, a crew of washed up revolutionaries, a pair of murderous psycho killers, some lost loot, and the fuzz.

name: Dirty Mary Crazy Larry
summary_text: Down-on-their-luck racers Larry and Deke steal from a supermarket manager to buy a car that will help them advance their racing chances. Their escape does not go as planned when Larry's one-night stand, Mary, tags along for the ride.

name: Money Plane
summary_text: A professional thief with $40 million in debt and his family's life on the line must commit one final heist - rob a futuristic airborne casino filled with the world's most dangerous criminals.

name: Mac and Me
summary_text: An alien trying to escape from NASA is befriended by a wheelchair-bound boy.

name: Grounded for Life
summary_text: Thirty-something Irish Catholic couple Sean and Claudia deal with their three children as well as Sean's judgmental father and carefree brother.

name: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
summary_text: The alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and prevent its closure.

name: Ocean's 11
summary_text: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.
